CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Renewal"), "Renewal", IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Self Service"), "Self Service", IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Upgrade"),"Upgrade", IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Upsell"), "Upsell", "New Logo" ))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculation based on Opportunity "Type" field to determine the Finance Order Type.
CustomField.label: Finance Order Type
